1.content:
You were just walking up to your house from a nice walk. You got some fresh air, grabbed a slice of pizza, and stole some allowance money from some brats. You hate kids, there smelly, stupid, annoying and everything they touch turns sticky. As you closed the door and locked it you suddenly feel a sharp pain in your chest. Like something is being pulled out of you. As you topple over gripping your chest you start to panic. "Wha... whats happening to me? is this a heart attack?" Looking behind you you see the outline of an transparent figure with no form standing over you with one hand in your back, tugging. "No! I'm to young! I'm not ready!" Suddenly your feel like you were covered in something that you were glued to and were being ripped out of it.

Suddenly you were flying threw darkness when you landed in a room. The room looked like a giant play room with a large desk. sitting in the desk was a woman that wore a cheerfuller looking shirt covered is smiling suns and moons. while reading some paperwork she lifted one hand to beckon you forward. walking up you see that she has a name tag with Tellena written on it. "So your the new recruit? I'm busy so let me make this clear now. You messed up big and wronged one child to many. Now you will spend the rest of eternity bringing them happiness. you are going to be an imaginary friend." You want to say something but you cant talk. she lifts one hand and touches your forehead and your body starts to turn grey and featureless, like living clay. and your head is filled with strange rules. that you somehow know you cant disobey.

Suddenly there is a blinding light and your in a new room. In the room you see a child playing alone. the strange part is your the same size as the kid. the child looks up and spots you standing near by. "High" the child raises one hand as if to wave. You give the same response not sure what ells to do. "Whats your name?" The child asked innocently. "I dont have a name you chose my name and what I look like. Even how big i will be. I'm your very own imaginary friend." Your screaming in your own head to stop and run. you must get away! "Really?" The child asked looking at you with eyes shining with joy. "Yes. after you decide what i look like and if I'm a boy or girl you must choose were i will live. when your not playing with me I will go their. and it wont mater how small I must be I will shrink to fit so don't worry." What am I saying?!?! I got to run! so why cant I? you scream in your own head. "anywhere? You can live in my toy box?" the kid asked. "If you like." you respond. "In my shoe?" You cringe inwardly as you say. "If you like." The child thinks for a moment before pointing to itself. "Inside my tummy?" A shiver runs down your spine at the thought and you try desperately to resist but cant. "If you like. I wont even be gross when you call me out. I'll be all clean." At this the child claps while giving off a shrill childish laugh.

How old is your new master?
1.title: your eternity.

choices: a weird child one of those ones you just cant explain why they do things.(Girl)
11.title: 3 years old

choices: Kelly starts to play with you
Kelly wants you to wear a diaper like her
it's time for Kelly to go to daycare and she's taking you with her
111.content:
The toddler little girl you stand before has long blond hair which is currently tied into pigtails with pink ribbons, she's wearing a pink shirt with sparkled designs of crowns, jewels, and stars along with a blue denim skirt, she was sitting with her bare feet spread out you could clearly see her purple diaper. The toddler puts her finger to her chin in thought before she looks down at the Barbie doll half submerged in her diaper and smiles "I know" she says "you be my wiving dolly" she said excitedly. Instantly you feel your body shrink to the size of a Barbie doll. "Hooray!" the toddler girl cries clapping excitedly "my name is Kelly and I'm gonna name you Dolly" she adds as she strips her doll of it's pink dress and puts it on you.

"Real original name" you say sarcastically.

Kelly chooses to ignore your comment "I'll dress you, and feed you, and make your hair pretty, and take you to daycare with me, and love you forever and ever and ever" she said. "And when we not playing you can live in my diaper" she said you cringe at the thought of living in a diaper. At that moment...
111.title: Dolly

choices: Bathroom across the hall. (Mom called bath time.)
1112.content: "Hey I have an idea dolly, you are smaller than me and I am wearing a diaper so I think that you should wear a diaper too" Kelly said as she reached for a doll diaper. You cringe but cant say no as your young master lays you down and fastens a pink, puffy diaper on you with little hearts all over it. When shes done and you stand up you see that the sort pink doll dress still exposes the diaper and your glad no one ells will be able to see you. At least you hope they wont. As your looking down Your giant of a master grabs you around the waist like one wold hold a doll and lifts you up. "At least shes gentle." You say quietly to yourself. When you look where your going you see she is sending you to her...
1112.title: Kelly wants you to wear a diaper like her

choices: "in my dirty cloths basket!" next to the dirty diaper pail.
115.content:
She looks to be around 3 years old. she has dirty blonde hair in pigtails and is wearing a yellow shirt and blue jean overalls with a flower on the front pocket. As you look at her she looks back while picking her nose. She pulls a booger out and then eats it. You feel a little sick from seeing that as she stands up and walks over to you and hums in thought.

"A skunk!" she said happily. she claps and giggles as your body starts to take the form of a anthropomorphized skunk. "A pink one! with purple stripes!" She calls out with a smile as your fur turned pink with the purple running down your back. it was a little hard to control because you never had one before but you pull your tail in front of you and look at it as the toddler admired her handy work. "A skunk?... you can chose to make me anything and you pick a pink skunk?" you asked in a slightly dapperest tone. "Yep! oh and a diaper!" As she said this you felt something thick form around your formally naked lower areas. Not that there was anything but fur to see. Looking down at the white disposable diaper around your waist you cant think of any way this can get any worse. "A poopy one!" I stand corrected. you think to yourself as you felt the back of your diaper fill with a squishy substance. "And your name is Miss Stinky!" and with that your body changed once more as you got slimmer a little more fimanen. "what an appropriate name." you say in a voice that sounds like it belongs to a teenage girl.

Suddenly she grabs you by the hand and pulls you along as she runs out of her room. It feels strange running in a diaper with the mess in back sloshing around. Soon you find yourself in a kitchen where a young woman was hard at work cooking what looked like dinner. "Mommy! Mommy! look I got a new friend! her name is miss stinky!" the woman looked around slightly confused. "Here mommy." Said the girl pointing to where you are. Looking in your direction she seamed to stare threw you before you saw realization come into her eyes. "Oh high Miss Stinky its nice to meat you. I'm Mommy." She said in the way one wold talk to a child as she bent down and held out one hand to shake witch actually reached into your chest like a ghost. Slightly freaked you hop back so the hand was outside of you. She then slightly closed her fingers then shook with thin air. "So why is she called Miss Stinky?" She asked her daughter as she pulled her hand back. "Because shes a skunk and she has a poopy diaper!" The girl replied happily. But by her mothers expression she found her daughter's chosen form for you as odd as you did. "Um... why is she running around in a poopy diaper?" Asked the mother. "Because shes stinky." her daughter replied as if it were the most obvious thing in the world. The mother just closed her eyes and slowly shook her head before getting up and returning to the food she was cooking. "Ok sweety mommy needs to get back to cooking so why don't you take Miss Stinky back to your room to play."

With that the girl grabbed your hand again and ran you back to her room. She takes you over to the blocks she was playing with when you arrived and sat you down on the floor causing you to squish the mess in your diaper as she sat down on the floor next to you. "Lets build a city and play monster!" she said excitedly. With a silent huff you start stacking blocks with her when you feel yourself about to ask a question. You don't want to ask it you don't even want to know with this kid. but you cant stop yourself. "So where will i live when you don't need me?" The girl had just placed a triangle block on one of her buildings when she stopped to think. "Hmm where will Miss Stinky live?"
115.title: Miss Stinky

choices: The mom is dumping Sara's cloths and you in the wash.(Rough ride)
Sara is taking you to the playground.(Rougher ride.)
Sara takes you to watch Saturday morning cartoons. (Easy morning.)
1153.content:
The child stood up and walked around the room. She seamed so stop and think about the toy chest but quickly decided against it. "Miss Stinky needs a soft place to sleep." she said to herself. Standing up you follow her around the room nervously. As she turned her head to the diaper changing table she squealed with glee as she ran over to it reaching out her hand to grab yours again but she was not looking and grabbed your tail instead. With a jerk you fall on your rump again feeling the warm soft muck in your diaper squish under you as you were dragged along your padded butt skidding and bouncing along the floor.

"This! Its stinky like Miss Stinky!" The girl chirped happily as she came to a stop and let go of your tail. Standing up you turn around and see her standing in front of two baskets. One of witch was the dirty diaper basket and you started to panic but calmed down when she walked up to the other basket and pointed at it. "You will live in this." She stated witch caused you to levitate of the ground and nose dive right into her dirty laundry. with some difficulty and a lot of squirming you manage to poke your head back out but you had a sock in your mouth and a pair of pants on your head. As the child fell over laughing you tasted a bitter salty sweat of her dirty sock and the pants on your head felt damp from her wetting herself earlier. You quickly spit out the sock and pull the pants off your head. "Comfy?" She asked smiling as she looked down at you. You guess its not as bad as the places you thought she was going to keep you. Even if there is little difference between the smells from this basket and the diaper one. "Its a little tight." You say without thinking. She just smiles and responds "You can be smaller!" And with that you felt yourself shrink. Thankfully not by much but your smaller now. You also guess by the time this girl is done with you for the day your just going to want to sleep in a soft place. You guess you'll just haft to get used to it. "Now you have a sleepy place! Common lets finish the city!" She calls as she runs back to her building blocks. When you climb out of your new home and walk over you see that you now reach her belly button area when standing side by side.

The next 10 minuets or so was spent building up a large block city with doll people and a few toy cars. When the last block was placed you suddenly felt yourself shrinking again as you dwindle down to a few inches tall. Looking up at the now giant toddler she lets out a playful "RAR!!" as she lifts her foot over you as if to crush you. With a frightened squeak you take off as fast as your paws can carry you into the block city. You hear a crash as giant blocks of every color the size of cars and trucks come crashing down around you. As you turn the corner the block structure to your right bursts forward with the pink shoes the child was wearing crashing threw and colliding with you sending you crashing threw a block tower sending it crashing to the ground. You land in a toy pink convertible and to your surprise it has a crank. You turn it as fast as you can before she can find you. She has some trouble spotting you at first because your fer blends with the toy car so you have time to crank it up good. When she sees you she charges forward crashing threw block. You quickly let go of the crank witch causes the car to shoot forward. You grab the wheel and turn a corner as you just miss being smashed by flying blocks. As you drive around the block city she just keeps rampaging after you making monster sounds and a few giggles as she was having fun. After a while of fast racing and near misses almost all of the block have been knocked down. Just as you think you might just win this little game you turn a corner only to find a pile of blocks blocking the road. With no room to turn around and no breaks you brace yourself as you crash into the block blockade. Slightly dazed you look up in time to see the girl down on all fours over you and shes leaning in with a wide open mouth. You scream as her jaws close around the sides of the car and lift it and you up into the air. You scream and cling tightly to the car as she starts thrashing her head around while making growling sounds. Soon its to much tho and you fall out into her mouth witch causes her to spit you and the car out. "You taste yucky." She said down to you as you hang from the edge of one of the remaining block towers as it wobbles before collapsing.

"Sara, Time for Dinner!" You hear the mother call. You then shoot back you so that your once again face to belly button with the girl you finally know to be Sara. "Common!" she calls to you as she runs out of the room. You chase after following into a dining room with two tables. One was a small table with two chars, one with a young man wearing glasses looking threw paper work. The other table was a smaller plastic one with small plastic chairs. Sara ran up to one chair and pulled it out. "You can sit in this one Miss Stinky." You walk over and sit in the chair squishing the mess in back once more as Sara Pushes you op to the kiddy table witch sitting down only the top of your shoulders and up are over it as Sara sits next to you. The man you assume is the father looks up from his paper work as his wife came in with dinner. "Miss Stinky?" He asked in confusion. "Sara's imaginary friend." the woman responded as she started making a plate for Sara. "Mommy can Miss Stinky have a plate to?" Sara asked. "Tell you what why don't you to share a plate with extra." Her mother responded as she set a plate with well chopped up steak with mashed potatoes and green beans. Sara use's a spoon to scoop up a piece of steak and potatoes before putting it in her mouth. Then spooning up some more before bringing it to your mouth to spoon feed you. You reluctantly open wide and let her, its not bad actually.

When Dinner was done her mother sent Sara off to brush before bet but not before Sara told you to go to bed yourself. As you were separated you walked to her room and climbed into the basket covering yourself in dirty cloths as you got as comfortable as you can in a dirty diaper while sleeping in smelly old baby cloths. Soon her mother is leading Sara in to her room before striping her down, Changing her now wet diaper, Throwing her cloths into your hamper and putting Sara to bed. Soon the mother starts singing Sara a lullaby witch between that and your exhaustion from today's playtime you quickly fall into a deep sleep. When morning comes you are awoken as---------
1153.title: A stinky home for Stinky.

11531.content:
As you slowly awoke from your sleep you thought to yourself that it was only a nightmare and now your back in bed rocking peaceful...rocking? Opening your eyes you see your in a basket filled with giant baby clothes. "Oh no" You say with realization that it was all real. You see that your basket is rocking but the lid is on so you cant see whats going on. When the lid dose open you see the mother looking down just before she tips the basket over. You and the clothes stained with Sara's diaper stink fall out into a dark metal hole with a small plastic tower with fins in the center. You struggled to climb your way back out but just as you poked your head out you saw the mother's face as it was disappearing behind a closing lid. When all went dark you hear a click and the sound of water filling the chamber. "NO!!!" You shout in a panic as you worked your way to the top of the pile and started banging your fists against the washers lid screaming to be let out. But the one person who can hear you, cant.

As the realization that your trapped for the ride sank in you felt the water rising up past your toes, then ankles, then knees. As you felt your loaded diaper sink below the water the water stopped. Replaced by the machine suddenly kicking into overdrive as you were knocked into the water and sloshing around as the center tower rapidly started turning left and right. Under water you were being stirred around with clothes all around you. The minuets ticked by on this wild water ride. Till everything stopped. The water started to drain and the walls started to spin rapidly. As the water was pulled away by the force you felt you were on that spinning ride at the fair. Soon everything stopped with the sound of a buzzer all around you. With everything still you find yourself tangled in several clothes and very dizzy. As your pulling yourself free light floods in as a slender hand reaches in and pulls out a handful of clothes. Ready and waiting when she reaches in again you grab some pants and hang on as she lifts you out. Before she could put you in the dryer you let go and fall to the floor. Landing safely on your padded bottom you find that your dry and your diaper is still filled with your surprisingly still warm, soft filth. Standing up you look around and from light coming from a window can tell that the sun has just come up.

Suddenly you feel a pull as you lift off the ground and fly threw hall ways till you land in the bed of Sara. Looking up she looks like she just woke up and must have summoned you. When she pulled her covers off she you see she has soiled and wet her diaper. "Where you go Miss Stinky?" She asked as she slowly lowered herself to her bedroom floor. "Mommy dumped me in the washing machine." You reply as you crawl over to the side of the bed and lay down. "NO, Miss Stinky can't get washed You sapost to be stinky!" With the feeling of the mess in the back of your diaper slowly sliding down your rump and settling and a sniff of the air you know you lost none of your stink. But fearful she might make you do something to get back your imaginary stink you try to set her mind to ease on it and jump out of bed and turn around with your tail raised high. "No look I'm still stinky, see." You sway your hips from side to side. Letting your mess swing around. If you can you wish you knew how to spray just to save you.

Suddenly you find the world growing around you as you shank so only a few inches tall. Looking up you see Sara's giant hand reaching down for you to encase you in her iron grip. With your head and a few limbs sticking out threw her fingers you can tell by the look on her face she was not convinced. She swung her arm back behind her back and looking down you see her other hand pulling back her waistband before your cage of flesh bars opens and you find yourself falling down into the rancid muck mixture of poop and pee filling her diaper. As you land with a splat in her swamp like mess her diaper snaps shut. "This will make you stinky again." Sara said before letting out a giggle at what she was about to do. Without warning the walls close in on you as Sara grabs the back of her diaper and squeezes it. As the muck comes at you from all directions you are coated in it from head to tail. When the pressure lets loose you look up as the floor of the diaper rushes up to squish against Sara's Butt as it and you smash into her butt and she starts smearing it all around in a circle. When the floor finally dropped away Sara let out a wet fart that let out a spray and gas of stink threw out the diaper. As she is doing this to you you don't even fight against it. You just sit in her filth up to your chest as her wet fart rains a spray of more mess down on your head with a look of defeat. Before the gass cleared you felt gravity take affect as your slimy prison fell before landing and Sara's massive rear end came crashing down on you with to you was a loud BOOM! You felt your body twist and crush as she started grinding her butt on the ground. After a few minuets she stopped as you can hear giant footsteps approaching. You felt the weight lift off you as Sara was being picked up. "Morning Sara. Smells like you need a change." The mother said as she walked Sara over to the changing station. "Miss stinky is in there." Sara said for no reason. "Yep, smells like shes back there. lets get her out." The mother replied as she laid Sara down to be changed. As the diaper tabs were ripped and it fell open you grew back to normal size and found that you were clean. "Alright Miss Stinky, out." The mother said while looking at your shins. But quickly obeyed as you crawled over and sat next to Sara as Her mother got to work.

When Sara's mom finished putting Sara in a fresh diaper Sara grabs you and holds you close in a hug as her mother picked you both up and carried you into the dining room. When she sets Sara down at the kiddy table Sara set you down on her lap. For a while you waited as Sara preoccupied herself petting you. When her mother came back she set down a plate and a sippy cup for Sara. "Just how you like it sweety. Chocolate chip pancakes with ketchup and prune juice." Sara reached down and picked up a piece of the cut up pancake and dipped it into the ketchup before putting it in her mouth. "Mmmm." Sou shudder in her lap some as she takes another piece, dips it, and brings it to your mouth to hand feed you. With no choice you except the piece and with much effort force it down. After breakfast the mother led us back to Sara's room where she dressed Sara in a pink and black dress with a skull wearing a bow on it.

http://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl::EH:...

With Sara Dressed and her hair done in a pony tail the mother said "Ok sweet heart its time...
11531.title: Much Needed Bath.

The child puts her finger to her chin in thought before she looks down at the baby doll in her lap and smiles "I know" she says "you'll be my baby sister" she said excitedly. Instantly you feel your body shrink to that of a two year old toddler girl with the same hair as this girl including this ribbon. "Hooray!" the girl cries clapping excitedly "my name is Kelly and I'm gonna name you baby Sarah" she adds as she strips her doll of it's pink diaper and puts it on you "I'll dress you, and feed you, and change your wet and stinky diapers, and take you to school, and let you sleep in my bed when we're not playing, and love you forever and ever" she said. "And look at the pretty outfit I have for you" she adds as she dresses you in a princess style dress at that moment...
141.title: Baby Sarah

choices: Leave you in the wet diaper
1412.content: Your feel a warm Sensation around your legs you finally notice that your diaper was wet. You look up at your new master and cry you haven't cried in ages. With some anger you stomp your feet and yell change me she looks down and decides to...
1412.title: You wet your diaper

choices: Changes your while cooing what a fussy little girl you are

15.title: 7 years old

153.content:
The girl was wearing dirty looking cloths with the lower pant leg of her pants and tips of her shirt sleeves tattered. she was wearing fake monster feet as shoes and a fake dog tail on a belt. Her face was painted brown with a dog nose painted on hers. She had fake wolf ears sticking out of her hair witch was a wild mess. next to her on the floor where clawed hairy gloves and fake fangs. and a few cheep Halloween toys one might hand out to trick or treaters. Thats right before you were taken it was a few days from Halloween. Looking around the room she had batman bed sheets. a T.V. with video games and her floor was cluttered with a few sports balls and toys like nerf guns and monsters with some dirty clothes here and there. Clearly a tomboy.

She stood up and walked over to you examining your clay like body. With a finger she poked you in the chest witch gave to her touch allowing her to push it into your body. As she pulled her finger out her lips spread into a toothy grin. "Cool your squishy! Like..." She lifts her other hand up to her face. It was holding what she was playing with when you showed up. It was black slime like the Gack you had when you were a kid. In the black slime were a few plastic army men that almost looked like they were trying to get out. You look down as you turn pitch black and you seam to melt some as you ooze black slime. You feel your lower legs give out as you sink into a small pool. lifting your hands to feel your face you have large holes were your eyes should be and your mouth felt like a soft jack-o-lantern mouth.

http://spacecrater.deviantart.com/art/ha...

In your moment of shock the girl grabs your hand with her free hand and pulled some. From the wrist it stretches like hot cheese from a pizza before breaking. While she was holding it you found that you can still move your fingers. She laughed as she squeezed and felt your hand ooze threw her fingers. When it dropped back into the pool of you below your hand grew back on your wrist. "What am I?" You finally managed to ask. "Your slime like this stuff i got tonight. You know, trick or treat smell my feet." You suddenly bent down to smell her feet. You didn't want to but you couldn't stop. Even threw her shoes you can smell a powerful smell that told you she walked far on her quest for candy. You don't even know how you can smell with no nose. When you stood back up she had a questioning look on her face at what you just did. She then raised one arm in your direction. "Smell my pits!" You have no choice and take a sniff. The smell was so much worse it burned to do it. When you looked back She had a huge grin on her face. "You haft to do what I say don't you?" You begrudgingly nod. With your answer she grabs you into a hug. "Your going to make a great new sister. the ones i have are stupped." You felt yourself change some as your gender was chosen. When she let there was a knock on the door before a woman dressed as a zombie bride walked in with a large bag. "Ok Jill I checked your candy its safe. Now go clean that make up off and get to bed you have a game tomorrow." Said the mother as she set the bag down next to the girls bed and left.

Jill took off her shoes letting you see that she wasn't wearing any socks. "Wait here." She said as she left the room. With nothing ells to do you look threw her video game collection. Mostly shooter and racing games with a few quests and wrestling. When the door opens she walks back in with damp hair with a towel around her. When she drops her towel you quickly look away while she dresses herself. When shes said she was dressed you walk over to her as she climbs into bed. "You still need to name me and chose were i will live." You cant help but say. You grow fearful as she looks at you in deep thought. "Hmmm, Your name is... Slimeanator. and your home... Hmm I want you with me. You can be my good luck charm in sports and so you will always be there... I guess you can live in my shoes, or stuck to my arm pits like my chewed gum when Therese no trash can.
153.title: Trick or Treat, Smell my Feet.

1533.content: where is the somewhere else maybe somewhere a bit less strange or maybe even more strange
1533.title: Somewhere ells.

15331.content:
"Oh I know! You can sleep in my closet." The girl said. Immediately you were pulled inside the closet. It stunk of socks and crumpled shirts were everywhere. You hold your breath but after a minute you gave up. The girl went to sleep almost immediately and you could hear a faint snore in the room. When you knew she was asleep you tried to get out of the closet but the door was stuck. Silently you cursed Tellena and forced yourself to go to sleep.

What time will it be? The next morning or the middle of the night?
15331.title: less strange

info.brief_description: As punishment for bullying little kids a spirit turns you into an imaginary friend.
info.description:
You always tortured kids making them miserable. As punishment you are taken by Tellena, the spirit that organizes and dispatches the creatures known as imaginary friends. Now turned into one you will be dispatched to a kid that will be your master. that kid will decide what you look like (Including your gender), how big you are, what you will do, and even where you will be kept when your not being used. when the time comes when the kid outgrows you you will be re-dispatched to a new kid.


Rules.
#1 no one but your child master can see, hear, or touch you.

#2 kids age will range from 3-7

#3 your actions can't be witnessed. So even if you give a piggy back ride and lift the child off the ground anyone who saw it wold only see a child pretending to ride something.

#4 You have no choice but to obey your kid's every wish.
